Mode 1: 'Anti-Ageing' (red light at 630nm): helps reduce fine lines and wrinkles, boosts collagen in the skin. Mode 2: 'Purifying' (blue light at 415nm): assists in killing bacteria that causes acne. Mode 3: 'Brightening' (green light at 520nm): helps alleviate pigmentation. Mode 4: 'Post Procedure' (near infrared light at 830nm with red light (630nm) and blue light (415nm)): accelerates healing and inhibits scarring Mode 5: 'Calming' (blue light (415nm) and green light (520nm): calms the skin and targets inflammation Mode 6: 'Anti-Ageing Express' (red light at 630nm): an intensified youth-boosting treatment (recommended treatment time is 10 minutes). *Please refer to the included operating manual for more information on how to use this product.

Step forward: Skin Hydrator - boasting a proprietary blend that works to repair skin's defences (thus 'locking in' moisture) while helping to strengthen its collagen framework for supple, resilient, luminous skin. Clinically proven to increase skin's hydration (by 16%), boost elasticity (by 18%) and reduce wrinkles (by 9%), the benefits only get better with use - increasing, after two months, to 21%, 26% and 18% respectively.

Harnessing olfactory chemistry and patented technology, this gender-neutral, anti-stress fragrance supplement brings the outside in, delivering the healing effects of nature at a moment's notice. Created by world-renowned perfumer Guillaume Flavigny, recipient of the Prix International du Jeune Parfumeur Cracateur, this sensory supplement counters the effects of everyday stress. This innovative fragrance replicates the molecular compounds produced by trees (read: phytoncides) that are credited for the positive health benefits associated with forest bathing, namely the balancing of stress levels and boosting the parasympathetic (rest) nervous system. As for the scent itself, expect a woody and smoky profile of vetiver, cedarwood, benzoin and pine, punctuated with clean resin and tart citrus notes. In research conducted by The Nue Co., 96% of participants felt less stressed within 30 minutes of using Forest Lungs and 91% felt their anxiety levels were reduced after using it for thirty days.

The probiotic used is derived from soil and delivers five billion potent vegan Bacillus Coagulans spores per capsule. These powerful spores lie dormant (so they're shelf stable) until they are activated by the pH of your small intestine, which is exactly where you want them. Like a daily dose of vitamin C for your skin, Topical – C is effortlessly easy to use: just dissolve 2-3 shakes in the palm of your hand with water or your favourite serum or moisturiser and apply to your face, neck and chest. With daily use, you can expect brighter, more even skin with a visible reduction in fine lines, scarring and pigmentation.
how_to_use: Typically recommended for AM routines, but you can use it at night too Dissolve with your favourite moisturizer, serum or water and apply to your face + neck. DOSE 2-3 shakes. To avoid redness, don't use it at the same time as glycolic, salicylic acid or retinol-containing products

name: de Mamiel Anchor de Mamiel Anchor

It works by calming overactive nervous systems, relaxing and soothing your mind back into a calm state so that sleep descends once again. The base oil combines a bespoke blend of herbs, watermelon seed and passionflower oil to maximise the absorption of minerals such as magnesium and zinc and B vitamins that are essential for quality sleep. BARBARA STURM INSIDE supplements can be taken all together or individually. description: Having gained recognition of late due to research that aims to unlock some of CBD's secrets, this extract is changing the face of the wellbeing industry. On average one 50ml bottle should last 30 days based on the recommended use. This product is intended to be taken sublingually (absorbed underneath the tongue).

Did you know your collagen naturally breaks down with stress and time? So while your own collagen might be best, it does need a little helping hand as we age to stay in good supply. The Collagen Protect supplement feeds your skin and protects your innate collagen supply with 3 vegan ingredients. Pure and fermented hyaluronic acid increases your skins moisture levels and reduces the intensity of fine lines at the surface. Tocos — sourced from organic Thai jasmine rice and grown by a farm collective in Thailand — works hard to protect your natural collagen and prevent early signs of visible ageing. Grown organically in China, silver ear mushroom is abundant in antioxidants and one of the only vegan sources of vitamin D (we learn something new every day) — at a dose of 2.45g this supports a healthy skin barrier. What’s even better? It tastes good too! So top up your daily caffeine boost or morning smoothie and care for your collagen with this ‘magical’ collagen supplement.

ingredient: Rice Bran Solubles (Tocotrienols), Tremella Fuciformis Sporocarp (Silver Ear Mushroom), Sodium Hyaluronate - Salt of Hyaluronic Acid. 100% NATURALLY-DERIVED INGREDIENTS.

name: LARQ Bottle 500ml LARQ Bottle 500ml
description: Say goodbye to mouldy water bottles - the LARQ Bottle features UV-C LED lights, making it the world's first self-cleaning and purifying water bottle that kills 99.9% of bio-contaminants at the touch of a button. The revolutionary design is built around LARQ's proprietary PureVis„ technology that harnesses UV-C light to eradicate germs by triggering a photochemical reaction that destroys their DNA it's a common sterilising in hospitals today! Another world-first, this technology makes the bottle the only mercury-free portable water sanitization system - we're always a fan of brands that forgo toxic chemicals (obviously!). As well as purifying water in 60 seconds when you press the button, it also activates on its own every two hours to keep your water and bottle clean. It's double-wall insulated - it keeps water cold for 24 hours and hot for 12 - and powered by a rechargeable lithium-polymer battery that lasts up to 1 month off of one charge, based on estimated usage of 3-4 cycles a day. We know what you're thinking, just how many filters am I going to have to fork out for? The answer is none! This bottle is filter-free so you won't need to worry about buying replacements. Instead, you can be happy in the knowledge that you invested in a sustainable, self-cleaning bottle.
how_to_use: Press the LARQ Bottle cap once to activate it and in 60 seconds you'll have pure water to drink. Travel Mode deactivates Self-Cleaning Mode and is recommended if you are storing your LARQ Bottle for an extended period of time or to conserve battery life. Normal Mode is a 1-minute cleaning cycle and delivers 12 mJ/cm^2 of UVC to the water and the inner surface of the bottle. Tap the button on the cap once to activate the cycle. Its the right choice for daily use if your water is from a trustworthy source. In Adventure Mode, the LARQ Bottle delivers a higher dose of UVC: >30 mJ/cm^2. Activate this 3-minute cycle by double-tapping the button on the cap. Its a good choice if youre not sure about the quality of your water or you just want extra peace of mind. Charging: The LARQ Bottle can be recharged via Micro-USB. It is located on the side of the cap. A charging cable is included with your LARQ Bottle.
ingredient: Built-in UV-C LED Double-wall insulated to keep water cold for 24 hours and hot for 12 Electropolished 18/8 stainless steel (BPA free) Rechargeable lithium-polymer battery MicroUSB connector Proprietary powder coating

name: Oskia Lactoferrin + Oskia Lactoferrin +
description: A do-it-all food supplement that supports the gut microbiome, oral health, skin health, iron regulation and your immune system, Lactoferrin + combines lactoferrin and L-glutamine in 100% natural, vegetarian and gluten-free capsules. Made from fresh cow’s milk and farmed in France, lactoferrin is a natural, biologically active, iron-binding glycoprotein made up of a whopping 691 amino acids. A key protein found within your body, it’s already in your saliva, tears, white blood cells and sweat, and boasts antifungal, antiviral, antiparasitic, anti-inflammatory and skin-healing benefits. L-glutamine on the other hand, is the most commonly-found amino acid in your body – it’s needed for immune support and the production of glycogen and muscle tissue. It even fuels your intestinal cells, which makes it a key support for the digestive system. Together, these two ingredients work to regulate and reduce inflammation while encouraging cell regeneration, which helps to calm blemish-prone complexions and support skin repair – working to smooth the look of post-blemish scarring. They also support the gut microbiome – encouraging healthy gut flora to improve gut conditions, your skin health and your immune system. If we had the power to present these hardworking capsules with a Nobel Prize, we would.
how_to_use: For skin, oral & gut health: Adults – 1 capsule a day. For oral health, open capsule, mix with water and gargle before swallowing. For immunity support: Preventative dose – 1 capsule, once a day, ideally during the winter months. Loading Dose (from the first inkling you’re feeling run down) – 1 capsule, 3 times a day, until feeling yourself. Suitable for children – Recommended dose 1 capsule opened and sprinkled onto food. CAUTIONS: Food supplements should not be used to substitute a balanced diet and healthy lifestyle. Lactoferrin is not intended to diagnose, treat or cure but designed only to support the natural immune system, gut and skin health. For all medical conditions, consult a healthcare practitioner prior to use and/or if you are allergic to dairy.
ingredient: 1 capsule contains: L-Glutamine (300mg), Bovine Lactoferrin (200mg), Magnesium Stearate (flow agent), Vegetarian Capsule (HPMC) Proferrin is a pure, native Lactoferrin, from fresh cow milk farmed in France.

name: Earl of East Japanese Bathing Ritual Bath Salts Earl of East Japanese Bathing Ritual Bath Salts
description: The key to a supremely soothing soak, the Japanese Bathing Ritual Bath Salts from Earl of East are crafted from a blend mineral-rich salts and essential oils that dissolve under running water to release their therapeutic aromas. Bliss incoming... Available in two heavenly scents, the only hard part is picking your favourite; taking its name from the Japanese word for hot spring, the Onsen scent profile has an uplifting medley of peppermint, eucalyptus and neroli that emulates the very same sense of serenity that makes the onsen a cultural tradition. The Shinrin Yoku literally forest bath in Japanese scent is an ode to the practice of disconnecting from our fast-paced world, being in nature and absorbing the peaceful atmosphere of the woods. It has an earthy profile of cedarwood, black pepper and oakmoss that conjures the image of a forest floor after the early morning rain abates. *adds to basket*

name: BeYou CBD Oral Spray with MCT Oil - 600mg BeYou CBD Oral Spray with MCT Oil - 600mg
description: Having gained recognition of late due to research that aims to unlock some of CBD's secrets, this extract is changing the face of the wellbeing industry. Shown in studies to lessen the impact of myriad aches, pains and ailments - from period cramps to pre-interview nerves - BeYou's CBD Spray - 600mg makes an excellent 'upgrade' for those who've already discovered its multiple benefits. Harnessing only the highest-quality natural ingredients, the brand uses MCT (coconut) oil as the carrier for their CBD spritz as it's swiftly absorbed and possesses a barely-there flavour. And because we all respond differently to things, you might find a lower or higher dose works better for you - CBD Oral Spray with MCT Oil 600mg option - which come in a choice of three flavours (we recommend 'Lemon' or 'Berry' for those who're unused to its distinctive (although inoffensive!) flavour).
how_to_use: Shake well before use. Spray directly under your tongue, and hold the oil for at least 90 seconds, until fully absorbed. We recommend starting with a total of 7 sprays per day, spread over 2-3 doses. For example, 3 sprays in the morning, 2 midday and 2 in the evening. One bottle of Full Spectrum CBD Oral Spray should last you 30 days if youre following the recommended use. Disclaimer: This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease, and BeYou Together Ltd makes no official medical claims surrounding CBD. This product is intended to be taken sublingually (absorbed underneath the tongue).
ingredient: Raw Organic MCT Oil (Coconut), hemp extract, natural flavouring

name: Slip Jet Setter Travel Pillow - Blush Slip Jet Setter Travel Pillow - Blush
description: Discover beauty sleep at 40,000 feet with the Slip Jet Setter Travel Pillow. Ergonomically-shaped to support the head and neck — so you won’t wake up on the shoulder of the stranger sitting next to you — this luxe pillow features a removable pure silk pillowcase to guarantee you step off the plane looking fresh rather than frazzled. With an adventure-ready carry bag and crafted from Slip’s patented Slipsilk in a gorgeous blush hue, this pillow delivers all the benefits you’d expect from the brand. Made to Slip’s exacting standards from 22 momme thickness, long fibre mulberry silk and non toxic dyes, Slipsilk has a lustrous shine and heavenly softness that’s kind to skin and hair. Scientifically proven to reduce friction and absorb significantly less face cream, it ensures your mile-high skin care routine actually goes where it’s needed, while warding off bed head and sleep-induced skin creases. ESPA Soothing Candle 200g ESPA Soothing Candle 200g
description: Strike a match, set the wick alight and breaaaaaathe... Housed in an effortlessly chic vessel - that would suit virtually any space - this hand-poured 100% natural, soy wax candle is infused with the brand's signature Soothing blend: a mellow, peaceful aroma of sandalwood, myrrh, rose geranium and frankincense. Beautifully created with white glass, they also come with a clean-cut metal lid that protects the candle and doubles as a protective plate to stand the candle on when it is lit.
how_to_use: Remove all packaging before lighting, keep wick trimmed to 3mm to avoid smoking. Protect surfaces which may be damaged. Stop use when 10mm of wax remains. Extinguish candle if it flickers, smokes or the flame gets too high. For best results, burn candle for at least 2 hours but less than 4 hours at a time. Do not move a burning candle and keep the wax pool clear of debris.

name: Smile Makers Orgasmic Manifestation of - Hot Smile Makers Orgasmic Manifestation of - Hot
description: C’est chaud! Think: sweaty palms, damp skin and perhaps one too many items of clothing… The Orgasmic Manifestation Hot inspires an energetic rush of passion that keeps your pulse rate high from the first strike of the match. To avoid spilling wax, use a lid to put out the candle.

name: Slip Silk Pillowcase - Queen (Various Colours) Slip Silk Pillowcase - Queen (Various Colours)
description: We spend a third of our lives in bed. By the time we’re 60, most of us will have slept for an average of 20 years. Given how well-acquainted this makes us with our pillows, it’s worth investing in the best pillowcase possible. Cotton cases can draw moisture from the face, hair and scalp, whereas Slips Silk Pillowcases are made from 100% pure mulberry silk, which is a breathable, natural temperature regulator. Gentle on skin and hair, this clever material helps to age-defy while reducing sleep-induced facial creases and stopping strands from being twisted and damaged throughout the night. Tested by an independent third-party lab, Slip's Pure Silk Pillowcases were shown to absorb significantly less face cream than the average cotton pillowcase, all while creating 43% less friction too! This means less inflammatory stress on your skin, and less stress on your hair in fact, if you’ve splurged on a fancy blow dry, this will ensure that it stays intact, saving you from waking up with a bedhead. Specially commissioned, the silk used is made to exacting standards developed and refined over ten years to achieve the ultimate combination of shine, thickness, softness and durability. In a spectrum of sublime shades from plum to rose gold via silver, ‘Blush’, ‘Ultra Violet’, 'Black', ‘Wildflower’ and ‘Peony’ or traditional white, there's a queen-sized (20" x 30") silk treat to suit every bedroom aesthetic.
how_to_use: Use up to 8 hours daily for maximum results.
ingredient: Made from 100% highest grade (6A) long fiber mulberry silk with a thickness of 22 momme, with invisible zipper.

description: If you're plagued by dry strands that far too closely resemble straw, then it's time to introduce the Bay Breeze Hydrating Shot to your hair care regime. Creating a zen-like atmosphere thanks to the Positivity, Energising, Restorative and Soothing Aromatherapy Oils, these varying blends harness the power of nature's most invigorating scents to encourage mood-lifting freshness. Doubling as the missing piece to your full body massage and the extra dose of tranquillity in late night bubble bath, these diffusing oils are oozing with everything from frankincense-inspired fusions to joyful jasmine notes. Open your mind and body to the recentering power of this sought-after set with just a few drops…

name: Pretty Pea Omega Pretty Pea Omega
description: Gone are the days of slimy fish oils taken upon your mum’s instruction, with the likes of Pretty Pea’s easy-to-swallow capsules proving that supplements can in fact be a joy to take. If you don’t manage to eat oily fish a few times per week, then you need Omega to feed your body with essential fatty acids, which in turn fuel a multitude of bodily functions. Think: heart health, circulation, inflammatory responses, hormone balances, cholesterol levels, cognitive function and concentration. In fact, Omega balances your mood and powers-up the brain and nervous system, all while caring for your bones, joints and cell membranes. It doesn’t end there — try these capsules to ensure strong hair, skin and nails, too.
how_to_use: One capsule to be taken two to four times per day, or as advised. To be taken 30 minutes before meals. Supplements should not be used as a substitute for a balanced diet and healthy lifestyle. Consult your GP before taking supplements and changing diet.
ingredient: Per 1000mg capsule: %NRV* (*NRV = Nutrient Reference Value). Omega 3: Eicosapentaenoic Acid (EPA) - 72mg, Docosahexaenoic Acid (DHA) - 48mg, Alpha-Linolenic Acid (ALA) - 150mg. Omega 6: Linoleic Acid (LA) - 200mg, Omega 9, Oleic Acid (OA) - 100mg. Fish Oil Concentrate, Cold Pressed Flax Seed Oil, Sunflower Seed Oil, Gelatin Capsule, Glycerol, Water, Vitamin E: D Alpha Tocopherol (soya).

name: Bala Bangles Bala Beam Bala Bangles Bala Beam
description: Bala Beam sheds all that is bulky, outdated and unappealing about the gym equipment piling up in your garage, basement and closet. Perfect for a multitude of movement, spice up your routine with the Bala Beam. Form meets function with Bala Beam. At 15 pounds, Bala Beams sculptural, ergonomic design is perfect for concentrated and compound movements alike. Press, curl, row, squat and lunge to increase strength, agility, endurance and balance. Available in two shades, ' Charcoal' and 'Blush', this is a must-add to your collection.

ingredient: Recycled stainless steel wrapped in baby-soft silicone

name: Moon Juice Beauty Dust Moon Juice Beauty Dust
description: The easiest, most-effective way to boost your beauty instantly and over time, Moon Juice’s Beauty Dust is chock full of essential, plant-sourced vitamins, minerals and re-energising extracts to get your skin glowing, fortify hair and recover that sought-after, luminous look. Ultra-easy to incorporate into your daily ritual, this power-packed cocktail has a slightly sweet, cocoa-esque flavour (it’s totally inoffensive), and can be added to hot drinks, mixed with your morning smoothie, or sprinkled over cereal or porridge. You’ll soon be receiving no end of “you look well” and “have you been on holiday?” comments from nosy co-workers who’re dying to know what your secret is. Whether you decide to tell them is another matter… (we won’t tell if you don’t).
how_to_use: Add to matcha, tea, milk, water, or smoothies. Stir into warm lemon water or make an iced berry lemonade. Get Dusted!
ingredient: Beauty Dust® Proprietary Blend (Lycium (Goji) Berry Powder°, Schisandra Berry Powder°, Rehmannia Root Extract, Ashwagandha Root and Leaf Extract°, Amla Berry Extract°, Pearl Extract, Stevia Leaf Extract (Reb A)°). °Organic

name: Nurse Jamie Beauty Bear Replacement Pillowcase – Small Nurse Jamie Beauty Bear Replacement Pillowcase – Small
description: With Nurse Jamies super sought-after anti-ageing pillow, you can fight wrinkles all night long. The innovative pillow has a unique U-shape design that cradles the face and neck, improving the quality of your rest and helping to minimise the sleep lines that can be etched into the skin at night. To add some colour variety and ease the urgency of your laundry load, these replacement pillowcases are just the ticket. Available in four fabulous colour options regal purple, crisp, fresh white, slick midnight grey and glamorous leopard each pillowcase has a smooth, silky satin finish that will support even the most delicate of skin types. Please note these pillowcases (size: 18" x 9") are designed to be used with the original, bestselling {Beauty Bear Age Delay Pillow}.
how_to_use: Note: Though these pillowcases are pre-washed, we recommend you wash the pillowcase in cold water on a delicate cycle, or hand wash in cold water, prior to first use. This pillowcase is for the original size pillow (18'' x 9'') and will not fit the new larger size (22" x 11"). Zipper closure, easy to remove Machine washable

name: de Mamiel Soothe de Mamiel Soothe
description: The product of extensive research into why we don’t sleep and what keeps us awake, de Mamiel’s ingenious Sleep Series is a sublime remedy for the over-tired among us. Soothe unburdens the mind of anxious, stressed feelings, allowing you to let go of governing thought and quelling any inner turmoil you’re experiencing. The clever blend works beyond mere sedation, providing a welcome balance and stopping the uncomfortable churning feeling we often hold in our centre. The base oil combines a bespoke blend of herbs, watermelon seed oil and passionflower oil to maximise the absorption of minerals such as magnesium and zinc and B vitamins that are essential for quality sleep. Together with luscious essential oils (including sandalwood, ginger root and mandarin peel) these ingredients will settle both senses and body to lull you into a deep, comfortable slumber. Working in harmony with de Mamiel’s Anchor and Settle blends, this forms part of the ‘Sleep’ phase of the brand’s Sleep Series, while Rise and Shine form the ‘Awake’ element.
how_to_use: Apply Soothe to your palms and gently warm in your hands. Place over your nose and breathe deeply for a minimum of 3 breaths. Anoint the inside of your wrists and rub into your stomach and centre line. Use at bedtime and as often as you need throughout the day.
ingredient: Citrullus Vulgaris (Melon) Seed Oil, Passiflora Incarnate (Passion Fruit) Flower Oil*, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Flower Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (High Altitude Lavender) Flower Oil, Citrus Sinesis (Sweet Orange) Peel Oil*, Styrax Tonkinensis (Benzoin) Resin Oil*, Citrus Reticulata (Petitgrain) Leaf Oil*, Jasminum Grandiflorum (Jasmine) Flower Extract*, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Neroli) Flower Oil*, Santalum Album (Sandalwood) Wood Oil, Monarda Fistulosa (Bee Balm) Flower Oil, Zingiber Officinalis (Ginger) Root Oil*, Boswellia Sacra (Frankincense) Resin Oil, Tillia Cordata (Linden) Blossom Extract*, Valeriana Officinalis (Valerian) Extract*, Eschscholzia Californica (California Poppy) Extract*, Humulus Lupulus (Hops) Extract*, Magnolia Officinalis (Magnolia) Bark Extract*, Withania Somnifera (Ashwagandha) Extract*, Schisandrae Fructus (Schisandra) Fruit Extract*, Astragalus Membranaceus (Astragalus) Root Extract*, Angelica Archangelica (Dang Gui) Root Extract*, Linalool°, Flower And Environmental Essences Angel Star (Stellaria Graminea) , Butterfly Orchid (Platanthera Bifolia), Early Purple Orchid (Orchis Mascula), Fly Orchid (Ophrys Insectifera), Sanicle (Sanicula Europaea), Yellow Wort (Blackstonia Perfoliata) *Certified Organic °Natural Essential Oil Constituents

ESPA Positivity Pulse Point Oil 9ml ESPA Positivity Pulse Point Oil 9ml

The harmonious blend of essential oils includes the spirit-lifting aromatic of jasmine, gardenia and rose geranium to provide a burst of happiness, whilst the vibrancy of bergamot and sweet orange serve as a fragrant reminder to count your blessings.

name: Slip Pure Silk Sleep Mask - Capri Slip Pure Silk Sleep Mask - Capri
description: Aside from waking you up, light and disturbances can cause you to frown at night, contributing to lines and wrinkles. To defy this ageing danger and ensure that your beauty sleep remains utterly uninterrupted, Slip's Pure Silk Sleep Mask shields your eyes in the most gentle, comfortable way possible. Crafted from 100% pure mulberry silk inside and out, the mask offers breathable temperature control, protecting the delicate skin around your eyes from any damage. Pure silk filler and a silk-covered elastic band makes it even more plush, and the gorgeous dark green gingham print will help whisk you away to an Italian getaway while you enjoy a sumptuous snooze.

ingredient: 100% silk, pure silk filler and internal liner (exclusive of elastic).

name: Slip Pure Silk Queen Pillowcase - Limoncello Slip Pure Silk Queen Pillowcase - Limoncello
description: We spend a third of our lives in bed. By the time we’re 60, most of us will have slept for an average of 20 years. Given how well-acquainted this makes us with our pillows, it’s worth investing in the best pillowcase possible. Cotton cases can draw moisture from the face, hair and scalp, whereas Slip’s Silk Pillowcases are made from 100% pure mulberry silk, which is a breathable, natural temperature regulator. Gentle on skin and hair, this clever material helps to age-defy while reducing sleep-induced facial creases and stopping strands from being twisted and damaged throughout the night. Tested by an independent third-party lab, these zippered pillowcases were shown to absorb significantly less face cream than the average cotton pillowcase, all while creating 43% less friction too! This means less inflammatory stress on your skin, and less stress on your hair. If you’ve splurged on a fancy blow dry, this will ensure that it stays intact and save you from waking up with a bedhead. Adding a touch of Italian luxury to your night-time rituals are a limited-edition collection of sublime shades from ‘Portofino’ to ‘Limoncello’ and ‘Pistachio’... there's a queen-sized (20" x 30") silk treat to suit every bedroom aesthetic.
how_to_use: Use up to 8 hours daily for maximum results.
ingredient: Made from 100% highest grade (6A) long fibre mulberry silk with a thickness of 22 momme, with invisible zipper.

name: Bed of Nails Acupressure Strap Bed of Nails Acupressure Strap
description: With 100% recycled plastic spikes arranged to work in a similar way to acupuncture needles, the Acupressure Strap by Bed of Nails is a convenient way target tension, stress and pain in the body. Simply wrap the strap around problematic areas (it's especially good for arms, legs and heads) to reap its benefits - it helps to ease tension, release endorphins (the body's own 'happiness' drug) and stimulate oxytocin to help you stay calm and relaxed. On top of this, the clever strap - combining Eastern wisdom with Scandi modernity - can is great if you struggle with sleeplessness, to rebalance you after a long-haul flight, to soothe aches and help take the 'ouch' out of menstrual cramps. Available in 'Botanic Green', 'Island Pink' and 'Jet Black', simply pick the shade that matches your aesthetic and prepare to feel pressure and tension ebb away.
how_to_use: With 100% recycled plastic spikes arranged to work in a similar way to acupuncture needles, the Acupressure Strap by Bed of Nails is a convenient way target tension, stress and pain in the body. Simply wrap the strap around problematic areas (it's especially good for arms, legs and heads) to reap its benefits - it helps to ease tension, release endorphins (the body's own 'happiness' drug) and stimulate oxytocin to help you stay calm and relaxed. On top of this, the clever strap - combining Eastern wisdom with Scandi modernity - can is great if you struggle with sleeplessness, to rebalance you after a long-haul flight, to soothe aches and help take the 'ouch' out of menstrual cramps. Available in 'Botanic Green', 'Island Pink' and 'Jet Black', simply pick the shade that matches your aesthetic and prepare to feel pressure and tension ebb away.

name: LELO Smart Wand 2 (Various Shades) LELO Smart Wand 2 (Various Shades)

Designed to relax and caress the body from head to toe, this massager frees tension while providing the ultimate orgasmic experience. Providing ten different massage patterns, the tool lets you decide the pressure, intensity and rhythm of your session. Ergonomically shaped, the massager is curved to fit around the clitoris, while a steadier handle at the top ensures easy use. Crafted from the softest silicone, the vibrator is waterproof up to 1m, providing pleasure in or out of the bathroom. The long-lasting charge gives up to four hours of pleasure for a solo mission or fun with a partner.

name: Slip Reusable Face Covering (Various Colours) Slip Reusable Face Covering (Various Colours)
description: Made from commissioned silk thats been developed to deliver flawless levels of shine, thickness, softness and durability, you wont find a face covering like the Slip Silk Face Covering anywhere else. Double-sided with 100% mulberry silk and a cotton inner, you can now protect your skin in super sophisticated style. Crossing the bridge between accessories and skin care, the Slip Silk Face Coverings long-perfected material promises to absorb less product than the average cotton face covering, allowing you to feel safe in the knowledge that your favourite moisturiser is, well, still on your face. This along with the fact that the Slip Silk Face Covering provides 43% less friction than those made of pure cotton helps to keep your skins moisture levels in check, all while looking wonderfully chic. Reusable and boasting adjustable elements for your nose and ears, the Slip Silk Face Covering comes with spare adjustable nose wires and silicone stoppers too championing comfort and ease as well as style. With a host of patterns and shades available, you can now pick and choose a Silk Face Covering to match your mood (and outfit!).
how_to_use: 1. Cover your mouth and nose with the face covering. 2. Your face covering should fit snugly but comfortably against the side of the face. 3. Adjust the ear loops and nose wire as needed. 4. Wash after use. See the care label inside for care instructions. Disclaimer: this is a non-medical face mask and is not classed as Personal Protective Equipment (PPE). It should not be used in a medical setting or when the use of a medical device or PPE is required.

name: HigherDOSE Infrared Sauna Blanket V3 HigherDOSE Infrared Sauna Blanket V3
description: Less of a splurge than installing a sauna in your home (one can dream) but equally as relaxing, this Infrared SaunaBlanket V3 from HigherDOSE works to raise your bodys thermal energy, promoting a temporary increase in blood flow; simply put, it tricks your body into thinking youre working out by making you sweat all while lying down. Sounds like our kind of investment Inspired by the wellness rituals of the rich and famous, this heated blanket strikes a balance between your mood and stimulating your body. It harnesses far infrared rays to prompt a deep sweat that encourages your system to dispel toxins, as well as boosting your heart rate to promote a radiant glow. Completely safe, its made of waterproof and fireproof polyurethane cotton, so you can lie back and relax!
how_to_use: Step one: Lay the blanket down on a heatproof surface a bed works well). Lie down and get into the blanket. Step two: Spend up to 45 minutes in the blanket relaxing; let the soothing infrared rays, amethyst, tourmaline, and magnetic therapy do the work. Step three: Feel refreshed, rejuvenated, balanced, and ready to take on the world. What's included? Your Blanket, instructions, controller, power supply cord, and connecting cords are all included in the box.
ingredient: Heat Zones: One heating zone Display: 1-8 level Control: White colour handle held controller Voltage: 220v (UK/EU models) Wattage: 350-420 Watts Amps: 4-5 Amps Timer Settings: 1 hour Electrical Field:Low EMF Warranty:One-Year limited warranty. name: Advanced Nutrition Programme™ Skin Accumax™ - 60 Capsules Advanced Nutrition Programme™ Skin Accumax™ - 60 Capsules
description: With a trail of doting fans – including beauty editors, bloggers and skin care mavens – this wonder-working supplement is specially formulated for those with problematic, acne-prone skin. Clearing blemishes without dryness, relieving redness and supporting healthy skin cells, it contains a cocktail of antioxidants – including vitamins A, C and E – to promote collagen production, protect cells from oxidative stress and maintain a healthy complexion. The supplement also contains BioResponse DIM – a patented, active plant compound found in cruciferous vegetables. The supplement isn’t only great for your skin – it feeds every cell in the body, supporting your immune system, nervous system, vision and energy-yielding metabolism too! All ingredients are of exceptionally high quality, with full traceability back to their origins and free from artificial flavourings, synthetic colours or genetically modified ingredients – plus, they contain no gluten or dairy! Housed in eco-friendly, recyclable paper packaging – even the ink is vegetable-based and eco-friendly – these vegan supplements are total do-gooders to both your skin and the environment. The supplement is available in three sizes: 60 capsules, 120 capsules and 180 capsules.
how_to_use: Take one or two capsules twice a day with meals or as your health professional advises. Do not take if you are under 16 years old, pregnant, breast-feeding or planning a pregnancy. If you are under medical supervision, please consult a doctor before use. In the very unlikely event of an adverse reaction to Skin AccumaxTM we recommend that you stop taking the product. If problems persist please consult your medical practitioner. Keep out of the reach of children. Harmless changes in urine colour may occur with the use of this product. Store below 25°C in a dry place away from direct sunlight and heat.
ingredient: Anti-Caking Agent: Tricalcium Phosphate, Hydroxypropyl Methyl Cellulose (Capsule Shell), Diindolylmethane Complex (Starch, Diindolylmethane, Vitamin E [As D-Alpha Tocopheryl Succinate], Phosphatidyl Choline, Silica), Anti-Caking Agents: Magnesium Stearate And Silicon Dioxide, Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid), Bulking Agent: Cellulose, Vitamin A Prep (Sucrose, Gum Arabic, Corn Starch, Retinyl Palmitate, Tricalcium Phosphate, Antioxidant: Dl-Alpha Tocopherol), Capsule Colour: Titanium Dioxide.

name: NAYDAYA Victory Oil NAYDAYA Victory Oil
description: Formulated with plenty of soothing, collagen-boosting ingredients, the Vagina Victory Oil is designed to nourish and treat intimate skin that may need some extra relief as a result of hormonal or environmental changes. This nourishing formula is filled with rejuvenating oils and butter that your skin will drink up. Pomegranate is renowned for being a powerful elixir that, thanks to omega-5-rich fatty acids protects dry, thinning skin and restores elasticity to vaginal tissue. Vitamin E helps improve skin's smoothness, builds natural collagen and locks moisture into the skin. Finally, there's mango butter, an effective natural emollient, and coconut oil, a hydration hero that helps to rebuild your skin's naturally protective moisture barrier. Victory is yours!
how_to_use: General Use for hormonal changes: Apply 3-4 drops of oil or as needed to fingertips, gently massage into intimate areas including perineal, inner and outer labia. For best results use daily, or twice per day to improve elasticity, and reduce dryness. Pregnancy Use: To use as a prenatal massage oil; apply 3-4 drops daily from 34 weeks of pregnancy. Post Pregnancy Use: As above, apply 3-4 drops daily, (we recommend waiting until stitches are healed, and wounds are closed)
ingredient: Improved formula with added oils for extra hydration. Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Raphanus Sativus (Radish) Seed Extract, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grapeseed) Seed Oil, *Cocos Nucifera (Virgin Coconut) Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, *Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract.*Certified Organic Ingredients.

name: HUM Nutrition Collagen Love Skin Elasticity Supplement (90 Capsules, 30 Days) HUM Nutrition Collagen Love Skin Elasticity Supplement (90 Capsules, 30 Days)
description: Formulated to help skin's elasticity and firmness, HUM Nutrition's Collagen Love is brimming with collagen peptides, hyaluronic acid and vitamin C to help visibly help with signs of ageing, minimise the appearance of fine lines, aid skin repair and protect too. Collagen is the protein in our bodies that gives our skin its strength and elasticity. One key contributor to ageing is reduced collagen production, which leads to wrinkling, sagging and discolouration. HUM Nutrition's Collagen Love contains a unique skin protection blend with Collagen I and III essential for healthy, young looking skin. Combining in a powerful formula with chondroitin sulphate and moisturising hyaluronic acid, this restorative blend supports elasticity and firmness in all the right places. Get some collagen loving to provide natural restoration and protection for your skin.

For the sleepyheads among us, these capsules boost energy levels through adrenal strength - helping to control stress levels and nourish depleted adrenal glands, which are responsible for your 'energy' hormones. By utilising adaptogens to monitor the release of stress hormones from said glands, your energy levels are boosted, fatigue levels are reduced, productivity is increased and tension is diminished. L-tyrosine (an amino acid) is used to create proteins that enhance physical and mental performance, especially when under stress! With a combo of calming and rejuvenating root extracts, (think ginger, rhodiola rosea and more) plus energy-enhancing vitamins C, B5 and B6, kiss goodbye to days ruled by a sleepy haze.

From your nails to your mane and supporting healthy, radiant skin, beauty really does come from within with Manifesto… Firm in the belief that feeling good in the mind, body and conscience is beauty’s highest ideal, Manifesto’s founder (Anna Marcovici) set out to create thoughtfully formulated, sustainably packaged supplements that do good and taste good. Formulated by nutritionists, these gummies hold within them the perfect balance of vitamins and minerals that support you from the inside out. A blend of biotin, inulin and acai berry unite to care for your strands, keep your nails strong and leave your skin luminous. When you've come to the very last gummy in your pink-hued tin, simply top up time after time with this eco-friendly refill pouch... Manifesto is making small but mighty supplements that make a bigimpact.

ingredient: Acai Berry Extract, Astaxanthin, Biotin, Selenium, Vitamin E, Vitamin C, Vitamin A, Zinc, Inulin, Fruit Pectins.

Taking inspiration from WelleCo's iconic premium greens powder The Super Elixir, The Skin Elixir is designed specifically to support a clear, glowing complexion in supercharged, on-the-go vegan capsules that are non-GMO, gluten and dairy-free. name: DoDow DoDow - Sleep Aid Device DoDow DoDow - Sleep Aid Device
description: A must-have for insomniacs or those who suffer with stress-related sleep issues, Dodow is a discreet and simple to use gizmo that helps you to utilise relaxation therapy, meditation and yoga methods with little-to-no effort. Simply turn on Dodow, select your time setting (pick from an 8 minute cycle or a 20 minute cycle) and get comfy laid in bed on your back. Dodow will reduce your breathing from 11 per minute down to 6 per minute to help you drift off worry and distraction free. Dodow aims to work quickly, effectively and naturally to counteract the effects of stress that are detrimental to sleep. It is also extremely effective from those suffering from circadian cycle sleep disorders or jet lag.

name: Elvie Pelvic Floor Trainer Elvie Pelvic Floor Trainer
description: There's a reason why experts and health authorities across the world recommend Elvie to women with pelvic floor problems - it's a hi-tech, comfortable and results-driven device that ensures women make the most of their pelvic floor exercises. Plenty of factors can weaken the pelvic floor muscles, including pregnancy, childbirth, ageing and high-impact sport, to the point that 1 in 3 women experience issues with them - and up to 80% of expectant mums. Designed to strengthen these muscles, the trainer can help to improve bladder control and sex, as well as preparing for childbirth and speeding up postnatal recovery. How does it work? The bulb of the tracker features force and motion sensors to measure the movement of your muscles as they contract and release. This is inserted into the vagina with the tail remaining outside and facing forwards (a little like a tampon), then via Bluetooth it connects to an app on your phone that will guide you through a series of five-minute workouts - from target hitting to strength exercises. There are four different levels to try - Training, Beginner, Intermediate and Advanced - all of which have been carefully designed with the help of physiotherapists and experts. The app also allows you to track your progress, set yourself targets and schedule reminders - plus it's fun, so it'll help you to stay motivated! Incredibly discreet, the device comes in a sleek carry case that doubles up as a charger so you can pop it in your on-the-go bag for use anytime, anywhere. 100% waterproof, the trainer is made with medical grade silicone making it incredibly durable and safe.
how_to_use: Elvie Trainer is easy to insert: place the bulb inside like a tampon with the tail remaining outside, facing forward. Be sure to fully insert the bulb, but don't push it too high up. You can use water-based lubricant if you wish. We recommend you use the trainer either standing or lying, legs apart. If you find Elvie Trainer is slipping out or moving about inside, please try using Elvie Trainer with the optional cover. We recommend all women use Elvie Trainer both with and without at first to decide which provides the most comfortable fit for them. Also try changing position - if Elvie Trainer is slipping out, you might want to try lying for a workout, and see if you notice a difference. As with all exercise we encourage women to set realistic goals, so we recommend using Elvie Trainer three times a week as a minimum. However, if you want to use Elvie Trainer even more then that's even better! Made from a very hygienic and durable material, it can be cleaned using warm soapy water. During normal use it will only need charging about once a month and can be stored in the portable carry case between uses. You can use Elvie during pregnancy as long as you are not experiencing from any complications. Every pregnancy is unique so if you are unsure please consult your qualified medical professional before use. You can use Elvie Trainer after your qualified medical professional has advised that you are ready to resume to normal activities at your postpartum checkup, this is usually around 6 weeks after giving birth. Elvie Trainer is safe to use if you have a coil or IUD fitted.
ingredient: Medical Grade Silicone

name: The Nue Co. Joints 60 capsules The Nue Co. Joints 60 capsules
description: It’s estimated that approximately one in every four people suffer from persistent joint pain or arthritis, with nearly 30 million adults reported to suffer from osteoarthritis – largely due to the natural degeneration of joint cartilage (something The Nue Co. is keen to pre-empt). As we grow older, the cartilage – the smooth, rubbery tissue that cushions our ‘hinges’ – begins to break down, leading to inflammation, discomfort and potentially, something more debilitating. Proven to protect this precious padding and to lessen pain in 90 days, Joints marries calcium, glucosamine and clinically studied Indian frankincense – a ‘Holy Trinity’ that helps to control inflammatory responses in the body while aiding mobility to keep joints strong and healthy, now and in the future. Another key ingredients is 5-Loxin (or Boswellia serrata gum extract), which is proven to counteract stiffness and improve physical function in osteoarthritis sufferers, as well as to reduce prevalence of the cartilage degrading enzyme – MMP – by 31% in 90 days. Curcumin (from turmeric) then works to block specific inflammatory enzymes and BioPerine boosts its absorption by 2000%, making The Nue Co.s proprietary formula even more powerful.
how_to_use: Take two capsules every day in the morning, with food or water. For best results, take with The Nue Co.'s Vitamin D as it aids the absorption of calcium in the body.

name: Advanced Nutrition Programme™ Skin Antioxidant 60 Capsules Advanced Nutrition Programme™ Skin Antioxidant 60 Capsules
description: Employing the benefits of plant nutrients and antioxidant-rich botanicals, this supplement helps to protect your skin from environmental aggressors (we’re looking at you, pollution).
